*GTD.Tags
--------------------------------------------------------------------
ID; Tag;     TillTagDefined;       TillTag_Suffix_Keyword
--------------------------------------------------------------------
1;  V1.0.0;   yes;                 with tillTag '${*GTD.TillTag.Tag}'
2;  V2.0.0;   yes;                 with tillTag '${*GTD.TillTag.Tag}'
3;  V3.0.0;   no;                  without tillTag defined
